►►► This video ◄◄◄  

I've been using an M1 Macbook Air for 4 years and a 15" MBP for a few years before that. But now with Intel Lunar Lake, AMD Zen 5 Strix Point and Snapdragon X Elite chips, it's time for me to switch back to Windows.

This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/techaltar-i-can-finally-switch-to-windows-again
